/* kr.co.dbvision.lib.ui.cmm.dept.service.impl.DeptMapper.searchTreeDept */ WITH MENU_MGR AS ( SELECT UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE, ORGNZT_CODE, DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_NM, ORGNZT_MNGR_EMPNO, ORGNZT_SE_CODE, ORGNZT_LVL, USE_BEGIN_DE, USE_END_DE, USE_AT, REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, 1 LEVEL, CONVERT(VARCHAR(255), REPLICATE('0',5-LEN(CONVERT(varchar(10), ORGNZT_LVL))) + CONVERT(varchar(10), ORGNZT_LVL)) AS MENU_LEVEL FROM MHS_ORGNZT A WHERE ORGNZT_CODE = '0000' UNION ALL SELECT MM.UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE, MM.ORGNZT_CODE, MM.DEPT_CODE, MM.ORGNZT_NM, MM.ORGNZT_MNGR_EMPNO, MM.ORGNZT_SE_CODE, MM.ORGNZT_LVL, MM.USE_BEGIN_DE, MM.USE_END_DE, MM.USE_AT, MM.REG_DT, MM.REG_ID, MM.UPT_DT, MM.UPT_ID, (MMGR.LEVEL + 1) AS LEVEL, CONVERT(varchar(255), (CONVERT(varchar(255) ,MMGR.MENU_LEVEL) +convert(varchar(255), MMGR.LEVEL) + CONVERT(varchar(255), REPLICATE('0',5-LEN(CONVERT(varchar(10), MM.ORGNZT_LVL))) + CONVERT(varchar(10), MM.ORGNZT_LVL)) )) AS MENU_LEVEL FROM MHS_ORGNZT MM INNER JOIN MENU_MGR MMGR ON MM.UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE = MMGR.ORGNZT_CODE WHERE MM.ORGNZT_CODE != '0000' ) SELECT ISNULL(UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE,'ROOT') UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE, ORGNZT_CODE, DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_NM, ORGNZT_MNGR_EMPNO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = ORGNZT_MNGR_EMPNO) AS ORGNZT_MNGR_EMP_NM, ORGNZT_SE_CODE, DBO.FNC_COMCODENM('C097',ORGNZT_SE_CODE) as ORGNZT_SE_CODE_NM, ORGNZT_LVL, DBO.FNC_DATESTR(USE_BEGIN_DE) AS USE_BEGIN_DE, DBO.FNC_DATESTR(USE_END_DE) AS USE_END_DE, USE_AT, (CASE WHEN USE_AT='1' THEN '사용' WHEN USE_AT='0' THEN '미사용' ELSE '미사용' END) AS USE_AT_NM, CONVERT(CHAR(10), REG_DT, 23) AS REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM,
(SELECT DEPT_KIND_CODE FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_KIND_CODE, (SELECT DEPT_KOR_NM FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_KOR_NM, (SELECT DEPT_ENG_NM FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_ENG_NM, (SELECT DEPT_ABRV FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_ABRV, (SELECT SORT_ORDR FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS SORT_ORDR, (SELECT DEPT_TELNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_TELNO, (SELECT DEPT_FAX_TELNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_FAX_TELNO, (SELECT DEPT_EMAIL FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_EMAIL, (SELECT DPRLR_EMPNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DPRLR_EMPNO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = (SELECT DPRLR_EMPNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE)) AS DPRLR_EMPNO_NM, (SELECT BUGT_USE_DEPT FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS BUGT_USE_DEPT, (SELECT USE_BEGIN_DE FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_USE_BEGIN_DE, (SELECT USE_END_DE FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_USE_END_DE, (SELECT USE_AT FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_USE_AT FROM MENU_MGR A WHERE ORGNZT_CODE != '0000'
AND ORGNZT_LVL <= (SELECT MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) FROM ( SELECT ORGNZT_CODE, DEPT_CODE, MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) AS ORGNZT_LVL FROM MHS_ORGNZT GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_CODE) WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE AND ORGNZT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{deptCode}||'%' )
AND ORGNZT_LVL <= (SELECT MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) FROM ( SELECT ORGNZT_NM, DEPT_CODE, MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) AS ORGNZT_LVL FROM MHS_ORGNZT GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_NM) WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE AND ORGNZT_NM LIKE '%'||#{deptKorNm}||'%' )
AND ORGNZT_LVL <= (SELECT MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) FROM ( SELECT ORGNZT_CODE, DEPT_CODE, MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) AS ORGNZT_LVL FROM MHS_ORGNZT GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_CODE) WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE AND ORGNZT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{orgnztCode}||'%' )
AND ORGNZT_LVL <= (SELECT MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) FROM ( SELECT ORGNZT_NM, DEPT_CODE, MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) AS ORGNZT_LVL FROM MHS_ORGNZT GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_NM) WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE AND ORGNZT_NM LIKE '%'||#{orgnztNm}||'%' )
AND USE_AT = #{useAt}
AND ORGNZT_LVL <= (SELECT MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) FROM ( SELECT USE_AT, DEPT_CODE, MAX(ORGNZT_LVL) AS ORGNZT_LVL FROM MHS_ORGNZT GROUP BY DEPT_CODE, USE_AT) WHERE DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE AND USE_AT =#{useAt} )
AND REG_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME, #{eRegDt} + ' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY MENU_LEVEL

/* kr.co.dbvision.lib.ui.cmm.dept.service.impl.DeptMapper.selectMhsDeptList */ SELECT ISNULL(A.UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE,'ROOT') UPPER_ORGNZT_CODE, ORGNZT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE, ORGNZT_NM AS DEPT_KOR_NM, ORGNZT_MNGR_EMPNO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = ORGNZT_MNGR_EMPNO) AS ORGNZT_MNGR_EMP_NM, ORGNZT_SE_CODE, DBO.FNC_COMCODENM('C097',ORGNZT_SE_CODE) as ORGNZT_SE_CODE_NM, ORGNZT_LVL, DBO.FNC_DATESTR(USE_BEGIN_DE) AS USE_BEGIN_DE, DBO.FNC_DATESTR(USE_END_DE) AS USE_END_DE, USE_AT, (CASE WHEN USE_AT='1' THEN '사용' WHEN USE_AT='0' THEN '미사용' ELSE '미사용' END) AS USE_AT_NM, CONVERT(CHAR(10), REG_DT, 23) AS REG_DT, REG_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM STM_USERS WHERE USER_ID = A.UPT_ID) AS UPT_NM,
(SELECT DEPT_KIND_CODE FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_KIND_CODE, (SELECT DEPT_ENG_NM FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_ENG_NM, (SELECT DEPT_ABRV FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_ABRV, (SELECT SORT_ORDR FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS SORT_ORDR, (SELECT DEPT_TELNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_TELNO, (SELECT DEPT_FAX_TELNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_FAX_TELNO, (SELECT DEPT_EMAIL FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_EMAIL, (SELECT DPRLR_EMPNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DPRLR_EMPNO, (SELECT KOR_NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = (SELECT DPRLR_EMPNO FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE)) AS DPRLR_EMPNO_NM, (SELECT BUGT_USE_DEPT FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS BUGT_USE_DEPT, (SELECT USE_BEGIN_DE FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_USE_BEGIN_DE, (SELECT USE_END_DE FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_USE_END_DE, (SELECT USE_AT FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE A.DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_USE_AT
FROM MHS_ORGNZT A
AND ORGNZT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{deptCode}||'%'
AND ORGNZT_NM LIKE '%'||#{deptKorNm}||'%'
AND ORGNZT_CODE LIKE '%'||#{orgnztCode}||'%'
AND ORGNZT_NM LIKE '%'||#{orgnztNm}||'%'
AND USE_AT =#{useAt} )
AND REG_DT <= CONVERT(DATETIME, #{eRegDt} + ' 23:59:59')

/* kr.co.dbvision.lib.ui.cmm.dept.service.impl.DeptMapper.selectMhsClsfList */ SELECT CLSF_CODE, CLSF_NM
FROM MHS_CLSF_CODE A
( CLSF_CODE LIKE '%' || #{clsfNm} || '%' OR CLSF_NM LIKE '%' || #{clsfNm} || '%' )
ORDER BY SORT_ORDR
